content.p: Our dedicated careers consultants are here to support you throughout your research career at Nottingham. Your careers consultants are Kirstin Barnard and Lucie Whitfield and they are based at the Careers and Employability Service in the Portland Building. They offer individual careers appointment and a timetable of events. To book an appointment or a place on their events, log into MyCareer, our online booking service. Log into MyCareer If you have any issues logging into MyCareer, please contact our reception on 0115 951 3680 or email us Book an appointment to discuss: These appointments are impartial and confidential. Use the MyCareer button above to book your appointment. To book your place on an event, please click on the event title and login to MyCareer. telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
